While inside his [[Susanoo]], Sasuke swipes his [[Amaterasu]] [[sword]] horizontally, proceeds with a downward stab at the ground that causes flame spikes to erupt, throwing his opponent up in the air, where he stabs them, and sends a final pulse of black flames through the sword.

== Trivia ==
* When written as "私怨", ''shien'' means "personal grudge", which ties in to Sasuke's character after transplanting [[Itachi]]'s eyes.
